properties.name: embedding.text-model-path
properties.description: Filesystem path to the preferred text embedding model.

properties.name: embedding.multimodal-model-path
properties.description: Filesystem path to the preferred multimodal embedding model.

properties.name: embedding.prefer-local-models
properties.description: Prefer loading local embedding assets before remote URLs.

properties.name: embedding.fail-on-missing-model
properties.description: Fail startup when neither text nor multimodal embedding models can be loaded.
